1: Sing a new song; marvelous deeds achieve victory.
2: Justice and salvation are openly revealed to all people.
3: Mercy and truth reach all; the world sees deliverance.
4: All people rejoice loudly and sing joyful praise together.
5: I sing with instruments and voice
6: I make joyful music with trumpets and horns.
7: Joy and unity fill the world and its people.
8: Creation rejoices together in joyful harmony
9: Justice rules the world and equity guides all people.
